comment: My onc said I can get it when its available to me, BUT because of my history I HAVE to be in a clinical or hospital setting. Somewhere there are epi pens & trained emergency responders! we all get there soon!

(m / multi-sentence

            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91

            :ARG1 (p2 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (g / get-01

                        :ARG1 (ii2 / it)

                              :ARG1 ii2

                  :concession-of (o2 / obligate-01

                              :ARG1 ii
                              :ARG2 (o3 / or
                                    :op1 (s2 / setting
                                          :mod (c / clinic))
                                    :op2 (s3 / setting
                                          :mod (h2 / hospital))))
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                              :ARG0 (h3 / history
                                    :poss ii)))))
      :snt2 (a2 / and

                  :mod (e / epi))

                  :ARG2-of (t / train-01))
            :location (s4 / somewhere))
      :snt3 (g2 / get-05
            :ARG1 (w / we
                  :mod (a4 / all))
            :ARG2 (t2 / there)
            :time (s5 / soon)))

comment: Theres not a lot of research for the vaccine & anything yet! Chemo does strip away a lot & make you vulnerable to infection. Which is why getting the vaccine is important. Its going to teach your body how to fight off this particular virus. *Im not a doctor*
amr:
# ::snt Theres not a lot of research for the vaccine & anything yet! Chemo does strip away a lot & make you vulnerable to infection. Which is why getting the vaccine is important. Its going to teach your body how to fight off this particular virus. *Im not a doctor*
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / research-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (v / vaccine)
                  :op2 (a2 / amp))
            :quant (l / lot))
      :snt2 (a3 / anything
            :time (y / yet))
      :snt3 (a4 / and
            :op1 (s / strip-01
                  :ARG0 (p / product
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Chemo"))
                  :ARG1 (a5 / and
                        :op1 (l2 / lot)
                        :op2 a2))
            :ARG2 (a6 / away))
      :op2 (m2 / make-02
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (v2 / vulnerable-01
                  :ARG1 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG2 (ii / infect-01
                        :ARG1 y2)))
      :snt4 (ii2 / important-01
            :ARG1 (g / get-01
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (v3 / vaccine)))
      :snt5 (t / teach-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / it)
            :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                  :manner-of (f / fight-off-02
                        :ARG0 (b / body
                              :poss y2)
                        :ARG1 (v4 / virus
                              :mod (p2 / particular)
                              :mod (t3 / this))))
            :ARG2 b)
      :snt6 (d / doctor
            :polarity -
            :domain (ii4 / i)))
